detaileddescription.para: The time step is calculated as a user-defined fraction of gyro time, whose formula accounts for relativity, or an user defined value is used as is depending on simulation options.

parameterdescription.para: index of marker for which time step is assessed

briefdescription.para: Simulates guiding centers using fixed time-step.

detaileddescription.para:
The simulation includes:
orbit-following with RK4 method
Coulomb collisions with Euler-Maruyama method

The simulation is carried until all markers have met some end condition or are aborted/rejected. The final state of the markers is stored in the given marker array. Other output is stored in the diagnostic array.
The time-step is user-defined either directly or as a fraction of gyrotime.

briefdescription.para: Simulate guiding centers using fixed time-step.
